name: Viking Voyagers
description:
Captain a crew of Vikings that have set out to find new land. Encounter various events on your time on the high seas. Order your crew properly to get past whatever obsticals that are in your way. With your command, will your ship and its occupants make it through the journey?

Brought to you by the Viking Voyagers Team:

Ben Wolfer, Josh Hubbard, Ben Attina, Deckard Manne
